Description:
Stylish and Updated
Perfectly positioned close to schools, shops and transport, this charming weatherboard home would be ideal for first home buyers, empty nesters or investors seeking a gorgeous home with nothing to do. Modern living sets the theme throughout the updated home, providing cleverly zoned living with plenty of space for everyone to enjoy! With a perfect layout for family living and entertaining alike, three bedrooms, serviced by the family bathroom, master with ensuite. The brightly lit and spacious lounge leads through to the meals area and well-equipped kitchen with dishwasher and stainless-steel appliances overlooking the yard. With timber floorboards, freshly painted inside and out and air con, youll be comfortable all year round. Outside is a North facing decked entertaining area, carport with drive through access perfect for storing the trailer and extra off-street parking. This immaculately presented and superbly located home within walking distance to Newcomb Shopping Village is definitely a crowd pleaser!

Description:
Location, Location, Location
When you talk about location in real estate, you do not get much better than this perfect family home within walking distance to everything that the Newcomb hot spot has to offer. Primary & Secondary Schools, Shopping Centres, Botanical Gardens, CBD / Waterfront and of course the South Geelong train station just 5 mins away. Set on an approx 660m2 allotment in an incredibly quiet pocket of Newcomb. The home's natural space lends itself to an extension and make your forever home or look to develop at your own timeline, all (STCA). The home itself consists of 3 great sized bedrooms, all with built-in robes. The kitchen, being the hub of the home has plenty of cupboard space, gas cook top, electric oven and with adjoining dining / living area. Central family bathroom. Also inc gas heating, AC cooling, large 9mtr x 7mtr lock-up garage with adjoining storage area. If you are looking for the perfect quiet lifestyle, with close walking proximity to all you need as well as only 1 hour to Melbourne and 10 mins to the Bellerine, this one should certainly pique your interest. A must inspection, A must Purchase.

Description:
The perfect start!
This property is sure to appeal to owner occupiers, investors and developers.
Situated on a large allotment of approx 798sqm, allowing the potential for subdivision/development STCA and only 10 minutes to Geelong CBD and coastal areas.
The home comprises a spacious lounge with ceiling fan, gas heater and AC, kitchen/meals with gas stove, 3 generous bedrooms - two with built in robes, master has an AC, bathroom with separate bath and shower, separate toilet.
Outdoors is a carport and extra space in the driveway providing plenty of off street parking. The west facing sunny yard has a large lawn area, established trees and gardens, cubby house and storage sheds.
Don't delay calling to arrange an inspection, this home provides enormous value for your money.

Address: 2 Townsend Road St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
Big accommodation, bigger value.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Matthew Constantine on 0401 393 993 or Matthew Hunt on 0433 176 611.
Perfect for the astute first home purchaser seeking the best start with maximum accommodation with maximum convenience. Packed with value this delightful residence provides its new owner the chance get everything they are seeking in a home and more. Within close proximity to a range of services ease of day to day living is assured.
Consisting of four spacious bedrooms, updated light filled kitchen, dining, lounge and plus large upstairs family room. Well maintained the home includes garage and carport with workshop, split system A/C, large private yard, solar system, water tanks and garden shedding. All positioned on a corner allotment of approx. 540sqm.
Located within easy distance to Bellarine Village Shopping, quality local schools, public transport, St Albans Reserve and only a short hop to Geelong CBD and the Waterfront. With all this on offer at an affordable price now is the time to book your inspection!

Description:
Large Corner Site Close to the City
Set on a double block and within close proximity to schools, shops and the city is this exciting development opportunity. The corner site has a total land size of 1,474m2 plus an additional carriageway from Boundary Road which is a real bonus. There is an original character cottage which is in need of renovating and consists of 3 bedrooms, lounge, kitchen/meals, double garage plus a variety of shedding. If you are a builder or developer this large parcel of land is ideal for a townhouse development or capitalise on the high exposure corner site (subject to council approval).

Description:
Sophisticated in style
Promising a multitude of incredible living zones that the whole family will adore plus sensational alfresco entertaining highlights, this stunning four-bedroom beauty is destined to impress.
Freshly painted this picturesque property offers an abundance of living options including separate formal lounge, open plan living and dining room with open fireplace and integrated Bose system, a light-filled family kitchen with ilve appliances and butlers pantry. All bedrooms are generous in size main with beautiful ensuite. The central bathroom with skylight is well renovated and classic.
A north-facing covered entertainers deck with outdoor kitchen and BBQ, easy-care garden and generous car accommodation are your standout outdoor features.
Located in quiet street with easy access to Garden Street cafe and retail precinct, Barwon Health and Medical precinct, Eastern Gardens and Geelong waterfront.
For more information on this property text '2 Lindon' to 0428 444 841

Description:
Morningsyde Heritage Charm On 1200m2!
INSPECTIONS WELCOME BY APPOINTMENT ONLY
Set upon a corner block of approx. 1200m2, this circa-1901 residence exudes an abundance of heritage charm! With only three owners to its name, this rare opportunity invites you to write the next chapter of this home's history!
A blissful lifestyle is yours to keep with Eastern Park, The Geelong Botanical Gardens and the Garden Street shopping precinct within easy walking distance. Eastern Park is home to a variety of sporting grounds and the East Geelong Golf Club, while Garden Street leaves you spoilt for choice with cafes and boutique shops. Families will appreciate that St Margarets Primary School and Geelong High School are both within close reach. Enjoy living moments from the delights of the Geelong CBD, Botanical Gardens and Geelong Waterfront.
Soaring ceilings and beautifully-retained period details enrich the interiors, which include decorative plasterwork and ornate timberwork. With enchanting gardens surrounding the home, you'll love that a picturesque outlook is captured from every window. Both the formal lounge and formal dining room are graced with an open fireplace - creating an enticing setting for both relaxation and hosting loved ones. Northern light sweeps through the kitchen/meals zone, where the kitchen features timber cabinetry, a large island bench, ample storage, and Miele appliances (dishwasher, oven, electric cooktop).
The Master Bedroom overlooks the front garden, while three additional bedrooms (two with built-in robes, one with built-in cabinetry) share close access to the versatile sunroom/second living room. The sunroom wraps around the north and eastern side of the home, with French doors opening onto the fully enclosed veranda to create a lovely sense of flow. In summer, you'll love opening up the windows to allow the balmy air to drift through both of these light-filled zones. The home office features built-in cabinetry, desk and filing cabinets, while two bathrooms complete the layout. Other features include two split-system air conditioners, an additional open fireplace, and security system with cameras.
The sun-drenched deck overlooks the expansive backyard, which creates a private wonderland for children and adults alike. Believed to be over 100 years old, the almond tree makes a majestic statement amongst the established gardens. The grounds are complete with an outside laundry, outside toilet, two rainwater tanks and veggie gardens. Accessed via Gurr Street, the single garage provides secure parking. A secure gate offers vehicle access to the backyard, which is ideal for extra off street parking or for storing caravans, boats and trailers.
You'll need to act swiftly to secure this rare opportunity! Inspect without delay!
Please ensure correct Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
for COVID-19 is worn. Photo ID required upon entry
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Simple, Stylish and Modern all on a Smart Block!
The perfect entry point into the tightly held 3219 postcode has never been easier with this immaculate 3 bedroom townhouse set on approximately 342 square metres. Updated with class and on the high side of the street in an allotment of 3 this stunning property will appeal to any serious buyer whether they be first home buyer looking to enter the market at an affordable level, downsizer searching for that low maintenance home with nothing to do but kick back and relax or investors wanting a great return of approximately $340 a week in a desirable location.
From the moment of entry this one oozes class with a manicured garden leading up to a magnificent merbau deck. Once inside youre greeted by a wide hallway with polished boards, 3 substantial bedrooms, all with built in robes and wall to wall carpet, sizeable living, dining and kitchen area and as an added bonus a fully enclosed sun room that leads out to a private rear courtyard.
The bright, light and inviting kitchen has been tastefully updated with quality stainless steel appliances including gas cook top, electric oven, range hood and dishwasher and is equipped with plenty of storage and bench space plus pantry and is perfect for the budding master chef! Additional extras include heavy duty blinds throughout, reverse cycle heating and cooling unit in the living room plus gas heater, beautifully appointed bathroom with exquisite tiling, separate bath and shower and an additional toilet off the sun room.
Theres a single car garage with remote control adjoining the home which can be accessed via the rear courtyard for extra security while for those that dont drive there is public transport nearby that will take you into the CBD. and to all that Newcomb and surrounds have to offer including Splashdown, Bellarine Village shopping centre, schools, shops and sporting facilities.
This truly is one out of the box and with property in this price bracket becoming harder to find youll never have a better chance than now to make your mark and make it yours. It simply wont last long so get in quick!

Description:
Development Site With A Free House!
This property is currently UNDER OFFER subject to a condition to be met. If you are interested in the property, please feel free to contact Wes on 0419 315 727.
Re-Development Opportunity In Newcomb (STCA)!
No inspections of the house will be made available, this property is all about the land.
Due to updated covid-19 guidelines, open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing of the exterior only on this property, please contact Wes on 0419 315 727.
Set upon approx. 652m2, this property is overflowing with infinite potential! (16.5 approx frontage and rear boundary x 39.6m in depth on both left and right boundaries.
Whether you want to knock-down the existing home to build your dream family abode or use the expansive land size for development, this is an opportunity not to be missed (STCA)!
With an approx. 16.5-metre-wide frontage and a north-facing backyard of approx 39.6m deep, this property puts the desired elements in place for family living or re-development (STCA). Savvy developers will instantly see the appeal to potentially build one townhouse behind the other (STCA). Noting that there is a sewer easement on the drive side of the property which can accommodate a driveway but not a dwelling.
This walk to everything location promises a convenient lifestyle, while also boasting superior access to Eastern Park and the Geelong CBD making this a popular location for both healthcare workers and CBD workers. The Watsons Road shops are footsteps from the front door, while a short walk will find you at the Bellarine Highway shopping centres meaning you dont have to venture far for your daily essentials. Public transport is also within walking distance, along with the sporting grounds of Ervin Reserve. Young families will appreciate that they can enjoy the fresh air on the morning school run, with Christ the King Catholic P.S, Newcomb Park P.S. and Kirralee Kindergarten all just moments away.
Youll need to act quickly to secure this potential-packed property! Enquire today!

Description:
Class & Convenience
An extremely loved family residence of many years, this original Californian Bungalow presents the exciting combination of position and potential that still possesses many of its original features, sought after by families, and is sure to excite.
There is no end to the possibilities that this lovely home presents. Highlights include a graceful fireside lounge, spacious kitchen, and dining, 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 with built in wardrobes, study, a generous covered outside entertaining area, looking over an impeccable backyard. Additional features include, plentiful storage, ducted heating, shed, manicured gardens, garage, and carport. The home itself boasts many original features such as; high decorative ceilings, the original fireplace, polished floorboards, period light fittings and lead light windows.
Situated in a stunning, peaceful street, this supremely located property has parks, sporting reserves, shops, and cafes all within an easy stroll. In only a moments' walk or drive find, East Geelong Golf Club, South Geelong Train Station and South Geelong Primary School, Geelong High School, with sought-after independent schools easily accessible. Local shops and eateries, Westfield Shopping Centre, Hospitals and The Bellerine Hwy, all just nearby.

Positioned in this quiet court in the growth pocket of Newcomb, this home has much to offer the family, with a garage any tradie would love.

Address: 14A Townsend Road St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
Great Opportunity For First Home Buyers Or Investors
PLEASE CONTACT PHIL FITZGERALD FOR A PRIVATE VIEWING
Boasting a rectangular shaped boundary harnessing a glorious 769m2 (approx) within and a very tidy three bedroom brick house positioned at the front, here is a property that will serve well for either first home buyers looking to get into the market with some great backyard family space or investors looking for a "no fuss" rent out proposition with land bank value intact for potential development in the future (STCA).
Walk in to discover a living and dining room all taking advantage of the incoming northern light. Floating floorboards underlay the living space while slate tiles have been durable for years in the dining and kitchen area. A split system and gas wall heater take care of temperature requirements in this front area of the house. Stroll further into the house to discover three well sized bedrooms with built in robes and ceiling fan in the main. A shower is separate to the main bathroom giving the option for kids bath time and Mum or Dad to shower in privacy at the same time. Outside on the western side of the house is a fantastic elongated outdoor entertaining area. Further out the back is the well maintained large rear yard featuring an assortment of fruit trees and garden sheds. A single lock up garage with extra workshop/storage space is positioned on the eastern side with a long driveway with the option to park many more vehicles.
With Bellarine Village and Newcomb Central only minutes away all shopping needs are close by. Bus stops are very close nearby and East Geelong Primary School is not far away on Boundary Road. A little further drive and you're into the Geelong CBD ensuring this property will be a sound investment for years to come!

Description:
Attention Downsizers, First Home buyers and Investors!
This neat 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom home with carport and garage is has everything you will need and more. Ideally located and newly renovated it is close to schools, public transport and Geelong CBD. Freshly painted throughout and comprising 3 good sized bedrooms all with newly laid carpet, 2 of which have built in robes. The new kitchen features electric cooktop, dishwasher and splashback. The generous lounge space at the front of the home features a gas space heater and slit system airconditioner which provides all year-round comfort. The laundry is at the rear of the home adjacent to the rear sliding door which leads to the back-veranda deck. Outside is a roomy backyard with lawn and shrubs and clothesline. A carport is located behind a high gate and is in front of a shed. For the investor this one will appeal because it's ready to rent and is expected to return $350-$370/week. This really is a fantastic package in a great part of town ready to go but with scope for further improvement. Priced to sell you'll need to be quick to inspect this one because it won't last.

Description:
You won't find better value ...
Situated in a very convenient location, 5 minutes to Geelong CBD and the Waterfront, minutes to South Geelong train station and local schools, 15 minutes to coastal areas, this property is one not to miss out on. Offered at an extremely affordable price we challenge you to find a better value home for your money.
The charm of this home will win you over as soon as you step in the door. The formal lounge is situated at the front of the home with glass sliding doors, the kitchen/dining area is situated towards the rear of the home to make full use of the sunny north facing aspect. With stainless steel gas cooktop and electric oven, the kitchen is cosy and functional, with a floorplan allowing future extension STCA.
The three bedrooms are all a good size and the central bathroom provides a shower over the bath and adjoining separate toilet.
Outdoors is a gorgeous private yard, lovingly filled with established plants and garden beds. There is a large storage shed and an undercover pergola perfect for sitting outside and enjoying the morning sun. the driveway provides plenty of room for offstreet parking, with a turning circle for ease of driving in and out. The large allotment is approximately 655sqm.
Perfect for first home buyers to enter the market in a central location, and will also appeal to investors, with an estimated rental income of $380 per week.
Call today for more details and secure this property as your own!

Description:
Immaculate - Inside and out!
Sitting on a great block of approx. 548sqm is this very neat & tidy entry level brick home that is ideal for first home buyers & investors alike. Featuring 2 bedrooms with ceiling fans, updated bathroom and laundry, spacious kitchen and meals area which opens up to the large lounge at the front of the home with glass sliding to door an undercover in-ground pool. There is excellent off street parking to a carport and then on to a new oversized double lock up garage. All the work has been done in this one with new flooring throughout including carpet to bedrooms, freshly painted and the lush, secure rear yard has new fencing. Located only a short walk to the Gordon Tafe, a short drive to Bellarine & Newcomb Village shops & with plenty of schools in the immediate area this property is not to be missed. Approx. rent of $330pw

Description:
Take Notice this Gem Wont Last!
Centrally located on a quiet street in one of Geelong's most sought after suburbs. This property offers loads of potential with local schools, childcare, sporting facilities and only moments to Geelong CBD & vibrant café precincts.
Situated on a generous 702m2 (approx) golden opportunity for developers (STCA), first home buyers trying to break into the market or investors looking to grow their portfolio.
Bursting with character this lovely family home is filled with natural light and comprised of 3 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, spacious kitchen/dining with gas appliances. Talking point is the huge shed turned man cave with a kitchenette and access to second bathroom. 0utside is low maintenance with plenty of undercover areas to relax. Other features include 2 garden sheds, gas heating, split system and fans throughout.
If looking for a character home in prime location with loads of potential, do not miss your opportunity to secure this ideal home.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Location, Location, Location
When you talk about location in Real Estate, you don't get much better than this perfect family home within walking distance to everything this hotspot of Newcomb has to offer. Primary & Secondary Schools, Shopping Centres, Botanical Gardens, CBD / Waterfront and of course the South Geelong Train Station only 5 mins away. The home offers location, along with entertaining and convenience in mind.
Entering this beautiful home, you will be greeted by its open, light-filled and spacious living areas. It boasts 3 generous sized bedrooms, all with built-in robes (main with walk-in robe), and a spacious home office. As you walk through the home, you have the open living, dining and renovated gallery-style kitchen area consisting of gas cook top & oven, Asko dishwasher, built-in pantry, and ideal outdoor front decked sitting area to relax. Other features include updated centrally located family bathroom along with ducted heating throughout and double carport. Add to this an ideal rear yard for the kids to play, as well as to entertain with 2 outdoor entertaining areas all situated in a very private landscaped setting to soak up that spring afternoon sun. Set on an approximately 557m2 allotment with convenient lifestyle to sit back and enjoy. A must inspection.

Description:
The Perfect Opportunity!
This stand out property is the perfect choice for investors or first home buyers. An exceptional block of 604m2 approximately has loads of potential with an expansive north-west facing backyard.
Nearby schools, shopping facilities and public transport in this highly sort after area of Newcomb make it perfect for the young family to begin their journey.
Perfectly positioned on a captivating allotment, the home features three generous bedrooms, central bathroom, sun filled spacious lounge and a separate kitchen/meals area.
Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity!
